content: It's so easy to write good example sentences, that even if we accidentally delete a few good sentences in the process of getting rid of a whole lot of bad ones, I think we could drastically improve the quality of this corpus by doing a lot of deleting.
translations: ita:È così facile scrivere delle buone frasi di esempio, cosicché, anche se cancellassimo per sbaglio alcune frasi buone men
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CK (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
